tool_description: This is a collection of APIs that are used to perform CRUD operations on the database. All the APIs are secured and do not require authentication to access the APIs.
name: Index APIs
title: Index APIs

api_list.name: Cities By State
api_list.description: To get all Cities in a State. Enter a state to get all Cities in a State
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://index-apis.p.rapidapi.com/get/State/Maharashtra"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "index-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://index-apis.p.rapidapi.com/get/State/{state}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "index-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Proxy
api_list.description: This API works as a proxy to serve any targeted URL. Works with any request method and can be used as a proxy to any other API and solve cors errors
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://index-apis.p.rapidapi.com/serve"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "index-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
